title: older version of Thunderbird installed
content: I have been having using Thunderbird as my email package for over 10 years and lately have been having issues. I was looking to cleanup the install (version 140.5 esr) and noticed an older version of the app still exist on the computer (version 68.4). will deleting this version have any implications. This computer was originally Windows 10 but has been upgraded to Windows 11 when the problems seemed to start appearing.

title: Android - importing Mcrosoft email account fails at Passkey generation.
content:
Installed on android phone, imported account configurations using the the bar code method. Gmail accounts all good, but Microsoft accounts all fail. Multiple reinstallations have the same outcome.

The failure occurs at Passkey generation all with the same message "We're unable to complete your request server_error: The contextID supplied in the request did not have a matching cookie" or "Something went wrong trying to create a passkey. Please try again." It uses Brave Browser when doing this.

Any ideas on how to progress?

Thanks
creator: bob-up

title: Gmail emails going to archives
content:
Hi I have 2 gmail accounts set up in TB. Neither of which are my daily accounts.

I've noticed that both of them put a copy of any email I receive into archives, as well as my inbox. I've checked my account settings & they're identical to those of all my other email accounts.

Not only that, but one of the accounts puts every email I receive into inbox, archive AND archive for that email address, so basically, I'm getting 3 copies of all those emails.

What I want to happen is what happens for all my other emails. They arrive into inbox & I put them in local folders/delete as appropriate

All help gratefully received Thanks
creator: deb36

creator: oleleerbeck

title: IMAPで接続ができない
content: 本件はIMAPでMicrosoft365アカウントをサインインしようとしたときに発生している事象です。 最初のユーザー追加画面で氏名とメールアドレスを入力します。 その後、メールアカウントの種類を選択する画面でIMAPを選択して「続ける」をクリックしても「設定を検証できませんでした。ユーザー名とパスワードが正しい場合は、サーバー管理者があなたの選択した設定を無効化している可能性があります。別のプロトコルを選択してみてください。」と表示され追加ができません。 上記メールアカウント選択画面で「設定を編集」をクリックしても結果は同様ですが、「詳細設定」→「テスト」をクリックすると、「次のアカウント設定が、指定されたサーバーを調べることにより見つかりました: 」と表示はされます。 しかし、続けようとすると「受信サーバーの設定がすでに存在しています。」と表示されてしまいます。 なお、Exchangeを選択した場合は追加できます。 Microsoft365アカウントについてはIMAPを有効化していますのでアクセスがブロックされているわけではないと考えています。 解決策を教えてください。
creator: shimaday.0908

title: Manage Identity with gmail
content: I have been setting up laptop for a local sports club. The underlying email account is a gmail account and I have used Manage Identities to set it up so that by default emails show as coming from the club's domain-related account, e.g. manager@sportsclub.uk. All seems OK; however, the email one receives from the account shows the correct signature, but still as coming from the gmail account Curiously though, if one hovers over the email address it shows the name of the 'manager identity' even though the display shows the name of the underlying gmail account. Everything is set up exactly as I have in my personal Thunderbird account which has several identities and all work as expected. The only difference is that my email account is a Plusnet one. So I assume that it must be a feature of gmail. Does anyone know if that is the case and what one can do about it?
creator: Nocton

title: Emails doesn't appear in my inbox
content:
Hello Everyone,

In Thunderbird, I'm receiving a notification that I had a new email, but then it disappeared and didn't appear in my inbox. It reappears after about an hour. (but i'm not sure if i'm receiving all the email email or not) This happened after updating to Windows 11.

There is enough space. I uninstalled and reinstalled. It's up to date. The emails are not in any other folders. The same problem occurs on the website. Everything is working OK with my company email address; the problem only occurs with my personal email address, and I use both on the same laptop. This issue happens with all received emails from all email providers, such as Gmail and Hotmail..etc. Can anyone help me with this issue?
creator: mostafa.earth

title: Drag and drop mails from inbox to subfolder
content: I have a problem with Thunderbird on Kubuntu 24.04.3. The drag and drop of mails from inbox to TB-folders stop working after a while. It always happens when I minimize Thunderbird and maximize again, then the drag and drop has stopped working. I have also seen it if I for instance make a new folder, then it also stops working. It has been going on for a while now, at least the last 3 month. I have automatic update on, so I an running the latest version right now 140.4.0esr (64-bit).
creator: mads.peter.jensen

creator: anadiegovillazon

title: Importing pst file from Mailstore
content:
I gave up on Outlook after a zillion years using it. When I reset my O/S (win11) I had to reinstall Outlook from Office, all paid up and legal. Nothing but problems trying to get my backed up PST file from previous Outlook. System kept trying to get me to subscribe to Windows 365 crap. I had standalone 2024 version of office. When I installed Thunderbird (I have it on laptops and other computers), I entered my email and voila, in about 1 minute I was sending and receiving emails. I had spent 6 hours on Outlook, even using AI (Copilot) to help me. I was SO IMPRESSED, that for once I donated to Thunderbird, $30 CAD.

Now, I used Mailstore to get my pst file, something I could NOT GET OUTLOOK to do, and have it available to export to Thunderbird, or for TBird to IMPORT from the pst. Neither one worked, telling me that TBird didn't have a profile for the transfer, or some such notation.

Any help would be appreciated. Like many of you, my whole communication life is in those emails (I have about 40 folders where I saved stuff).
creator: bobfound
